channel.title: abmSHARE Epidemiology :: SHARE-CZ Project in the Czech Republic
channel.description: Epidemiological Model abmSHARE In collaboration with the Faculty of Biomedical Engineering at CTU and the company DNAi s.r.o., we are developing an agent-based epidemiological model called abmSHARE. This model will be able to use input data from both the SHARE project and Eurostat, at the geographical level corresponding to NUTS2 regions. The goal of the model is to simulate the spread and impact of Covid-19, using data from the SPLASH database, which contains information on policy measures implemented during the pandemic.
